roleset.name: contract work to an outside entity
roleset.note: OUTSOURCE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from outsource.01-v)
OUTSOURCING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, outsource.01. No VNcls. (from outsourcing.01-n)

example.name: outsource
example.text: [We] are trying *PRO*-1 to outsource our foreign policy to China.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Moreover, half of them are looking to increase their outsourcing of application services
